publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2822 Dr Elaine Murray: Moffat Rugby Club’s Promotion—That the Parliament congratulates Moffat Rugby Club on its success in securing the Glasgow and District League Championship and promotion to the National Division 5B West, noting that this success has been achieved despite the club having been in existence for only 10 years.
S2M-2822 Moffat Rugby Club’s Promotion (lodged on 17 May 2005) Scott Barrie*

S2M-2822 Dr Elaine Murray: Moffat Rugby Club’s Promotion—That the Parliament congratulates Moffat Rugby Club on its success in securing the Glasgow and District League Championship and promotion to the National Division 5B West, noting that this success has been achieved despite the club having been in existence for only 10 years. Supported by: Scott Barrie
